revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Distortion World |image = [[File:Distortion World.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Distortion World. |tokens = 86,500 |location = East of Route 214. }} '''Distortion World''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 1,350,400 HP.
'''Must clear Sendoff Spring and become Sinnoh Champion to unlock.''' == Encounter Tables == ===Wild Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || colspan=3 rowspan=8 |
N/A |- | [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- | [[File:Duskull.png|40px]] Duskull |- | [[File:Dusclops.png|40px]] Dusclops |- | [[File:Chimecho.png|40px]] Chimecho |- | [[File:Chingling.png|40px]] Chingling |- | [[File:Bronzor.png|40px]] Bronzor |- | [[File:Bronzong.png|40px]] Bronzong |} ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Giratina_(altered).png|40px]] '''Giratina (altered)*''' ||
11,880,000 || [[File:Galactic_Boss_(cyrus).png|40px]] Galactic Boss Cyrus || [[File:Houndoom.png|40px]] Houndoom, [[File:Honchkrow.png|40px]] Honchkrow, [[File:Crobat.png|40px]] Crobat, [[File:Gyarados.png|40px]] Gyarados, [[File:Weavile.png|40px]] Weavile ||
1,128,000 |} '''*Note: Must be Sinnoh Champion to unlock Girantina (altered)''' ==Items== ===No Debuff=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || 4 || 44.64% || 43.50% || 38.55% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || 2 || 22.32% || 21.75% || 19.27% |- | {{Pokemon|Banette}} || N/A || 11.16% || 10.88% || 9.64% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Lime Shard}} || N/A || 20.85% || 22.19% || 28.05% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Rare Bone}} || N/A || 0.35% || 0.56% || 1.50% |- | {{Bag2|Odd Keystone}} || N/A || 0.35% || 0.56% || 1.50% |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 0.35% || 0.56% || 1.50% |} ===Debuff Drop Table=== After Reaching Alola, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with weight < 2. {| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- !
